type SymMethod = class inherit SymMethodBase interface ISymbolMethod interface IDisposable

summary.span: 代表符號存放區內的方法。

span.span: Represents a method within a symbol store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的符號相關屬性的方法，例如序列點、 語彙範圍和參數資訊的存取。The class provides access only to the symbol-related attributes of a method, such as sequence points, lexical scopes, and parameter information. 使用類別來讀取的型別相關屬性的方法。Use the classes to read the type-related attributes of a method.

summary.span: 釋出 Unmanaged 資源並執行其他清除作業後，記憶體回收才能重新回收 。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數會傳回其方法的簽章中定義的順序。The parameters are returned in the order that they are defined within the signature of the method. 傳回的陣列是空如果方法沒有參數。The returned array is empty if the method does not have parameters.

param.name: document
param.span: 要求 IL 位移範圍的文件。

span.span: The document for which the IL offset ranges are requested.

param.name: line
param.span: 要求 IL 位移範圍的文件行。

span.span: The document line for which the IL offset ranges are requested.

param.name: column
param.span: 要求 IL 位移範圍的文件資料行。

summary.span: 取得起始和結束位移組的陣列，其對應至這個方法內指定位置所涵蓋的 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL) 位移範圍。

span.span: Gets an array of start and end offset pairs that correspond to the ranges of Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offsets that a given position covers within this method.

returns.span: 起始和結束 IL 位移組的陣列。

span.span: An array of start and end IL offset pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列是以格式的整數的陣列 {{開始時間 1，end1}，{開始時間 2，end2}...}，其中每一組代表方法內的 IL 位移的範圍。The array is an array of integers in the format {{start1, end1}, {start2, end2}...}, where each pair represents an IL offset range within the method. 範圍數目長度除以 2 的陣列。The number of ranges is the length of the array divided by 2.

summary.span: 傳回對應至方法內位移之最封入的語彙範圍。

span.span: The most enclosing lexical scope for the given IL offset within the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法來啟動本機變數搜尋。You can use the method to start local variable searches.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void GetSequencePoints (int[] offsets, System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] documents, int[] lines, int[] columns, int[] endLines, int[] endColumns);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSequencePoints(int32[] offsets, class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] documents, int32[] lines, int32[] columns, int32[] endLines, int32[] endColumns) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub GetSequencePoints (offsets As Integer(), documents As ISymbolDocument(), lines As Integer(), columns As Integer(), endLines As Integer(), endColumns As Integer())

public: virtual void GetSequencePoints(cli::array <int> ^ offsets, cli::array <System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::ISymbolDocument ^> ^ documents, cli::array <int> ^ lines, cli::array <int> ^ columns, cli::array <int> ^ endLines, cli::array <int> ^ endColumns);

abstract member GetSequencePoints : int[] * System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit override this.GetSequencePoints : int[] * System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: symMethod.GetSequencePoints (offsets, documents, lines, columns, endLines, endColumns)

param.name: offsets
param.span: 用來儲存從方法開頭之序列點 IL 位移的陣列。

span.span: An array in which to store the IL offsets from the beginning of the method for the sequence points.

param.name: documents
param.span: 用來儲存文件的陣列，序列點位在這些文件中。

span.span: An array in which to store the documents in which the sequence points are located.

param.name: lines
param.span: 用來儲存文件行的陣列，序列點位在這些文件中。

span.span: An array in which to store the lines in the documents at which the sequence points are located.

param.name: columns
param.span: 用來儲存文件資料行的陣列，序列點位在這些文件中。

span.span: An array in which to store the columns in the documents at which the sequence points are located.

param.name: endLines
param.span: 序列點結束處的文件行陣列。

span.span: The array of lines in the documents at which the sequence points end.

param.name: endColumns
param.span: 序列點結束處的文件欄陣列。

span.span: The array of columns in the documents at which the sequence points end.

summary.span: 取得目前方法的序列點，並將資訊儲存在指定的陣列中。

span.span: Gets the sequence points for the current method and stores the information in the specified arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列點用來對應原始程式檔位置與 IL 位移。Sequence points are used to map between source file locations and IL offsets. 每個序列點 IL 位移，包含與指定的開始和結束行/資料行的來源檔案區域數字相對於物件。Each sequence point consists of an IL offset, and source file region specified by start and end line/column numbers relative to an object. 位於指定索引的每個陣列的每個項目會對應至特定的序列點。Each element at a specific index of every array corresponds to a specific sequence point. 呼叫端必須提供預先配置的陣列來儲存要傳回的資訊。The caller must supply pre-allocated arrays to hold the information to be returned. 陣列中的任何值會覆寫。Any values in the arrays are overwritten. 使用擷取所有序列點的計數，並建立適當大小的陣列。Use to retrieve the count of all sequence points and create arrays of the proper size. 序列點會先後依照位移和適用於所有文件中的方法。The sequence points are sorted by offset and are for all documents in the method. 確認每個陣列的大小，並將每個序列點資訊。 verifies the size of each array and places the sequence point information into each. 如果任何陣列是`null`，不會傳回該陣列的資料。If any array is `null`, the data for that array is not returned.
